  <au-typewriter

TypewriterInstance å±æ€§ â€‹

å±æ€§åè¯´æ˜ç±»å‹
renderedContentå½“å‰æ¸²æŸ“çš„å†…å®¹ComputedRef<string>
isTypingæ˜¯å¦æ­£åœ¨æ‰“å­—Ref<boolean>
progresså½“å‰è¿›åº¦ç™¾åˆ†æ¯”(0-100)ComputedRef<number>

ç±»å‹å®šä¹‰ â€‹

typescript
interface TypingConfig {
  step?: number
  interval?: number
  suffix?: string
}

interface FogConfig {
  bgColor?: string
  width?: string
}

interface XSSConfig {
  enable?: boolean
  options?: {
    ALLOWED_TAGS?: string[]
    ALLOWED_ATTR?: string[]
    [key: string]: any
  }
}

interface TypewriterProps {
  content?: string
  isMarkdown?: boolean
  typing?: boolean | TypingConfig
  isFog?: boolean | FogConfig
  highlight?: (code: string, language: string) => string
  mdPlugins?: any[]
  xss?: boolean | XSSConfig
}

interface TypewriterInstance {
  interrupt: () => void
  continue: () => void
  restart: () => void
  destroy: () => void
  renderedContent: { value: string }
  isTyping: { value: boolean }
  progress: { value: number }
}
